features.name: Login Page
features.description: Cybernetic-styled login UI with Sign In and Sign Up buttons that redirect to WorkOS hosted authentication. Shows authenticated user info when logged in.

features.name: OAuth Callback
features.description: Handles OAuth redirect from WorkOS after successful authentication using AuthKit's handleAuth function.

features.name: Session API
features.description: GET endpoint that returns current authenticated user data or 401 if not authenticated. Used by child apps for session verification.

features.name: AuthKit Middleware
features.description: Next.js middleware that handles session management, token refresh, and authentication enforcement using WorkOS AuthKit.

features.name: Convex User Sync
features.description: Webhook handlers that sync WorkOS user lifecycle events (created, updated, deleted) to the application's users table in Convex.

features.name: Auth Client SDK
features.description: Shared SDK package with useUser hook and login/logout helpers for child apps to integrate with the auth service.

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components including Matrix background, CRT overlay, and Neural cursor for the cybernetic aesthetic.
